text: allenkil ninnalute manas'sukalil valutayi teannunna etenkilumearu srstiyayikkealluka (ennalum ninnal punarujjivippikkappetum) appeal, aran nannale (jivitattilekkâ€Œ) tiricc keant varika? enn avar parannekkum. ninnale adyatavana srsticcavan tanne enn ni parayuka. appeal ninre nere (neakkiyittâ€Œ) avar talayattikkeant parayum: eppealayirikkum at ? ni parayuka at atutt tanne ayekkam
